choices: We're all going on a vacation together.
We're going on a 3 week vacation tomorrow morning, leaving you all here.
144121.content:
"Come on Teagan, it's not the end of the world, think of it as an adventure." Comes the chipper voice of your dad over the low growl of the car engine. He is happy, and he has every right to be. He is moving in with his new wife, Karen today. You however have little to be happy about. It's only been about year since your mom died and your dad seemed to be out on the dating scene almost immediately. He would always respond with "your mom would want me to be happy"' whenever you called him out on it and while you believe this to be true, you think your mom would be raising an eyebrow if she knew her husband had remarried only the months later. To top all that off, you hadn't even got to meet your new step mom before the wedding. All dad would say was that she's a doctor and has kids herself, he never did get around to telling you how they met but if he had you woul dn't have cared. All you know is that you don't like her. The cherry on the cake however comes in the form of both you and your dad uprooting and moving into Karen's house which is a four hour drive away from everyone you have ever known.

You look in the passenger wing mirror and see your pouty reflection stare back at you. http://www.polyvore.com/cgi/img-thing?.o...
You are Teagan. You're a 17 year old boy, much to the confusion and amusement of most thanks to your remarkably feminine, soft appearance and long hair. You're effeminately slim and you stand at only 5 ft 2 at most. You had been bullied when you were younger but over time, people got used to you and got bored of making fun of the "sissy boy" seeking other targets instead. That's something you get to look forward too in this new town, new school, new bullies. Excellent. You have an older sister at college called Sally who thinks its cute that your dad is finding love so fast however, she isn't the one who has to move, she's already independent. It's as if you are the only one who remembers mom.

Your dad, Steve, is a commercial airline pilot, a well payed job with odd hours. He is away more often than he is at home which is why in his mind it makes sense to move in with Karen since he's hardly around anyway.

You sigh and try for one last futile attempt to change his mind. "Dad, you know how hard it was for me to fit in at school before, at a new school with no friends, I'll have to go through it all again."

"Don't be silly Teagan. That was a long time ago, people your age should be more understanding." you roll your eyes knowing he is not at all aware of the cruelty of high school, "and besides, you have your step sisters to be friends with you and show you around. Lauren is the same age as you while Molly is just a year younger so there isn't a huge gap between you all. You'll all get on." He says confidently.

You had seen Molly and Lauren only once at the wedding but never actually met them. From what you can remember, Molly was the typical girly girl type while Lauren seemed pretty average. Molly was about the same size as you while Lauren was taller but both kept to themselves. You aren't sure how they feel about their mom marrying your dad and you moving in but you can't imagine them being anymore thrilled about it than you are.

"Here we are" Your dad says as you he turns off the road up a driveway leading to a large and very nice house. You can tell Karen is a doctor. http://www.addspacetoyourlife.com/wp-con... "At least I won't be living in a dump" you think.

Your dad parks in front of the garage, unfastens his belt and steps out of the car. You do the same and while the fresh air and afternoon sun are refreshing after a five hour car drive, it does little to cheer you up. "Give me a hand with the boxes son." your dad calls as he rummages in the back of the car. After a quick stretch, you open the rear door and grab a couple of boxes you know to contain some of the stuff from your room.

Because of the size of the car and the fact your dad was too cheap to hire a moving van, a lot of stuff was either left or donated to charity. You made it clear however you would not be parting with any of your things.

Carrying the box, you follow your dad to the front door which opens as you reach the steps revealing Karen. "Hi sweetie, how was the drive?" she asks your dad. He responds by quickly placing his box on top of the one you are carrying and embracing his new wife for a long kiss. Now laden with another box, you struggle to keep balance but thankfully the weight is lifted as Molly appears and takes the top box from you. "

"Thank you." you say gratefully and she offers you a friendly smile. She is wearing a pink tank top with with a pair of black leggings, her long blonde hair worn down. You have to admit, your younger step-sister is a hottie.

By now, your dad and step-mom (shudder) have finished kissing and are facing you and Molly. "Ah already helping your step-brother out are you?" Your dad says smiling from the doorway.

Molly whirls round to face you again with shock on her face. "Your a boy?" she asks in disbelief.

You don't know how to respond to this question and just mumble a confused, "Yes?"

Molly's eyes widen and then she turns to her mom. "You didn't say Teagan was a boy."

"Don't be silly Molly, of course I did." Karen responds.

"No, you just said that Steve had two kids, Sally and Teagan."

"I showed you a picture dear." Karen says, getting very conscious of how awkward everything has got.

"Yeah but he looks just like a girl. How was I supposed to know if you didn't tell me?"

You sigh and glare at your dad. Its started already. The ones who he had so confidently told you would be your friends didn't even know you were a boy. You wonder just how much thought and communication went into this move.

"Molly!" Karen snaps, "You are being very rude to Teagan, apologize at once"

Molly faces you again, still looking at you a little oddly. "I'm sorry if I offended you Teagan, I just didn't expect. well.... you." Despite the clumsiness of the apology, you can tell she is sincere.

"Happens all the time." you say, working up a smile.

"Right, now that you're both introduced, why don't you show Teagan to his room?" Karen says.

"Okay mom. Follow me." she says to you.

You follow her inside the house and are instantly impressed by the interior. She leads you up a set of stairs to top floor and opens one of the three doors revealing a rather girly bedroom. https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736... Molly chuckles as you cringe.

"Mom let me and Lauren decorate for you and like I said, we thought you were a girl so..." she stifles another laugh.

"Well, its bigger than my old room. And its got an en-suite." you say, ignoring her laughter and setting down a box on your bed. You open it up and smile down at some of you nic nics from your old house.

You and Molly head back down and continue to unload the car into your room. You don't talk much but you do learn that the other two room on the top floor belong to her and Lauren. As you are bringing in the last box, your dad suddenly emerges from a room carrying a glass of red wine. Not being able to stop, you colide into him and you watch in horror as the wine spills all over you, leaving you soaked.

"Oh crap." Your dad curses, "Teagan, watch where you are going." He looks around frantically. "Your lucky, it seems to have all gone on you, we can't be staining the carpet as soon as you get hear. Now go fetch your clothes box from the car and find something clean to wear."

"But I thought you brought in my clothes." you say. You are certain the only clothes box you have brought in belongs to your dad and Molly hasn't taken one either. Your eyes suddenly widen as you remember earlier that day when you dropped off some boxes at the local charity store. Your dad had been in a rush and you were both half asleep so it could be possible that a mistake was made. Sure enough as you frantically open the box you are holding, you find it to contain old toys and board games. Dropping the box, you dash up stairs to your room and tear open each box finding no sign of your clothes anywhere. Desperate now, you run back down stairs to find your dad, you find him and Karen with everyone else in a large living room. You notice Lauren sat on a chair in the corner but go straight for your dad.

"Teagan, what did I say, go get changed. Karen and I have an announcement to make to you all."

"I can't, you've accidentally given the boxes with my clothes in to charity this morning. I don't have anything to wear" you say frantically.

Your dad's expression doesn't change for a moment before he groans and brings his hand over his eyes. "Oh no." He groans again. Karen places a hand on your dad's shoulder.

"Don't worry, dear. It can happen to the best of us."

"I'm sorry Teagan. I'll give you some money to get some new stuff later." He says

You look to Molly and see her fighting laughter again while Lauren is also grinning.

"But now, we have an announcement." your dad says recovering his composure. "Karen and I have been talking and we know that this is a awkward situation for you all so to try and bring you together...
144121.title: Yes.

1441212.content:
... Karen and I are going on a three week honeymoon to leave you guys alone and let you settle in. Our flight is tomorrow morning"

"I know this may seem a little sudden but recent studies indicate that step-siblings interact and form better relationships when the parents are away." Karen says. "We will be giving you a generous weekly allowance so you can go to the movies and things like that together but Lauren and Molly will be in charge. Teagan, you do as they say."

"What, why?" you protest.

"Because girls around your age are much more mature and responsible than boys. Besides that, they know the town and the house." Karen replies.

"Promise me you'll do as they say." Your dad says, looking you in the eye.

You look to both Molly and Lauren who are both beaming in delight then look at your feet. You sigh in defeat. "I promise."

"Good lad." He rummages in his pocket and produces his wallet. After removing a sizable wod of bills, he hands them to Lauren. "This is the money for Teagan's new clothes. Don't let him waste it on video games or something."

"I'll make sure he won't." Lauren says, looking directly at you still smiling. The girls must be loving this.

The moment is interrupted by the horn of a car outside.

"Ah that must be our taxi." Karen says, "Have you got our bags ready?"

"Yep. Have you got your passport?" Your dad replies.

"Uh uh, well, I guess we are good to go."

"I thought you said your flight is tomorrow." Molly asks.

"It is but we don't want to be in a rush so we're staying at an airport hotel overnight. Excuse me." Your dad says trying to get to the front door.

"Now you girls know the rules and you'll find the money I left you all on the dresser in my room with a list of phone numbers. Teagan remember to listen to your sisters." Karen gathers you all together for a quick hug before she herself dashes out of the front door. "See you in three weeks. Call if you need anything." And with that, she closes the front door leaving you and the girls alone in the house.

Wanting to start of as best as possible, you turn to Lauren and extend your hand to shake hers, "I guess you already know but I'm Teagan." you say with a smile.

Lauren takes your hand in hers. "Lauren" she says. She is currently wearing a hoodie with a pair of jeans. While not as feminine as her sister, she is still very attractive, her blonde hair in a loose ponytail however. "Now let me get one thing clear." she says, her voice menacing now. "I was expecting a girl arriving today not some little sissy so you are going to do whatever Molly and I say, when we say it. If I say cook us both dinner, you will cook us dinner." Her grip on your hand tightens to the point where it is painful. You try to pull away but she is too strong. "I Molly asks you to clean her room, you will clean her room."

You yelp as her grip tightens more and tears start to well in your eyes. "Let go, what are you doing." you try to pull your hand from her again with no success. Your mind is struggling to understand what is going on.

"I'm sorry. Did I hurt you?" Lauren says in a patronizing voice. She lets go of your hand and you yank it back. "How about you go get cleaned up and we can talk later. We can't have you in dirty clothes can we?"

"You know I don't have anything else to wear" You say angrily.

"I can help you with that" Molly says, patting you on the arm gently and smiling at you sweetly. "Follow me." She heads up stairs and you follow her up. "Go get out of those dirty clothes in your room, I'll be in a minute with something for you to wear."

Not sure why you are so compliant to her smile, you go into your room and do as she say. You strip down to your boxers and are folding your dirty clothes on your bed when you hear a soft giggle from the doorway. You turn and see Molly gazing at your almost naked form holding a set of clothes. Looking closer you see she is holding.

choices: Super Rabbit vs Jocko A.K.A King Klutz.
151.content:
Once upon a time long long ago it was the first day of Summer in 1990 as the last Shoney Bear and friends comic series ended as we went our separate ways, as Shoney Bear went to Honolulu Hawaii for some well deserved rest and relaxation, Penny Possum went to Austin Texas to see what Austin's city life is like, Rhonda Raccoon went to Miami Florida to be with her family, and of course yours truly Bart Bunny decided to travel to New York as I always reminded myself a bunny rabbit like me can make it anywhere even in New York.

After arriving in New York and already needing a place to reside Professor Willard brought me to his laboratory since a walking talking animated bunny rabbit shouldn't be living on the streets of New York as he put me in a cage next to his pet monkey Jocko.

Later that day as Jocko and yours truly happened to be in our cages the professor's molecular intensifier itself went off and fired a beam at Jocko as he began to grow to being 30 feet tall while he outgrew his cage as he headed towards a wall itself and smashed it to pieces as he was now on the loose in New York.

I knew I had to do something as Jocko had to be stopped at any cost as all of New York's citizens were in trouble as the city's people needed a superhero to save the day in other words they needed the rabbit of steel Super Rabbit to save the day.

"This looks like a job for Super Rabbit." I heroically said as I put on my Superman like costume as the professor noticed I was wearing a Superman costume of some sort.

"What's with that Superman like costume you're wearing?" He asked.

"To make a long story short I have an heroic alter ego in other words Super Rabbit." I told him as he let me out of my cage as we both walked outside to see what was happening.

"Now then Professor Willard since Jocko's 30 feet tall I won't be able to defeat him since I am the size of an average human being but what if I was the same size as Jocko himself?" I asked the professor.

"Well since you need to be at least the same size as Jocko himself I also invented a smaller version of the molecular intensifier which can make you the same size as Jocko himself." The professor explained as he fired the molecular intensifier at me as I grew 30 feet tall myself.

"Now it's time to stop Jocko and save the day and all of New York all in the name of truth justice and the all American way." I said as I stomped off to find Jocko A.K.A King Klutz himself.

Will yours truly Super Rabbit be able to stop Jocko A.K.A King Klutz or will all of New York and the world be doomed? Be sure to watch this king of the monsters sized battle.
